class MarvelService{constructor(){var _this=this;this._apiBase='https://gateway.marvel.com:443/v1/public/';this._apiKey='?apikey=35184d6c2169fa4afb43d4ec486bd3cb\n';this._baseOffset=210;this.getResource=async url=>{let res=await fetch(url);if(!res.ok){throw new Error("Could not fetch ".concat(url,", status ").concat(res.status));}return await res.json();};this.getAllCharacters=async function(){let offset=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:_this._baseOffset;const res=await _this.getResource("https://gateway.marvel.com:443/v1/public/characters?limit=9&offset=".concat(offset,"&apikey=35184d6c2169fa4afb43d4ec486bd3cb"));return res.data.results.map(_this._transformCharacter);// const res = await this.getResource(`${this._apiBase}characters${this._apiKey}`);
};this.getCharacter=async id=>{const res=await this.getResource("".concat(this._apiBase,"characters/").concat(id).concat(this._apiKey));return this._transformCharacter(res.data.results[0]);};this._transformCharacter=char=>{return{id:char.id,name:char.name,description:char.description?"".concat(char.description.slice(0,210),"..."):'Sorry, description has been lost somewhere in the UNIVERSE',thumbnail:char.thumbnail.path+'.'+char.thumbnail.extension,homepage:char.urls[0].url,wiki:char.urls[1].url,comics:char.comics.items};};}}export default MarvelService;
